attributes.title: My frog is sad
attributes.review: Very bad format my frog couldn’t understand anything and it made him sad :(. So I declare that you make it so ALL creatures can use this. I just want my frog to feel welcomed.

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS
attributes.review: This app was a great disappointment to me as a Christian ⛪️ a patriot 🇺🇸 and as a citizen.  This app gave a lot of FAKE NEWS 😡🤬 I won’t tolerate it any longer. For anyone interested on getting it— save yourself time 🕰⏰

attributes.title: Terrible app!
attributes.review: This app broke my phone! After I opened it, my phone started to call me homophobic slurs and call me dish washer! 😡😡 it also just hired hit men to kill my family! One star! 🤬🤬

attributes.title: Very Disappointed
attributes.review: I was going to vote for Mr. Trump as Little Joe is no good but when it asked for my number I got many spams and it crashed my phone. Do not get it will hack your phone.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!
attributes.review: Ughh this app is so bad I was just trying to support president Cheeto (oops sorry meant trump). But the app keeps spaming me with Fake news and false narratives of making America great. If I could rate this app 0 stars I would 😫

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: oh my god this was THE WORST app i’ve ever downloaded, once i got on they showed my inappropriate videos and pictures. THEN they found my credit card and bought LOTS of Trump 2020 stuff with it! DO NOT RECOMMEND UNLESS U WANT TO BE HARASSED AND RIPPED OFF!!!!

attributes.title: This app was awful🤢
attributes.review: I wanted to vote for trump as a devoted republican but right after I did it gave my phone a virus and gave my grandma herpes. This app made me break my leg and made my sister break my door. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!!!

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Right away the app asked for so much info which could lead to hacking and also had false news. 👎🏻

attributes.title: Needs work
attributes.review: Very buggy, prone to freezing at odd times.  Content is questionable and functionality is not useful. Wait for update Nov 3rd.

attributes.title: Unfortunately filled with fallacies
attributes.review: Yeah, this app’s sole existence is dedicated to feeding his cult of Trumpers. Information is misleading and unfortunately biased. I expected more from Mr. Trump, it’s not like he hasn’t been doing this since 2016!
